name: UFGTargetPointLinkedList
comment: Copyright 2016-2018 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: InsertItem
methods.comment: Add a new item in the end of the linked list

methods.name: RemoveItem
methods.comment: Removes the desired element from the linked list

methods.name: GetFirstTarget
methods.comment: Get the first target in linked list

methods.name: GetLastTarget
methods.comment: Get the first target in linked list

methods.name: SetPathVisibility
methods.comment: Sets visibility ( and collision ) status of all the targets in the linked list

methods.name: SetNextTarget
methods.comment: Sets target in the linked list to the next available. Will loop

methods.name: SetClosestPointAsTarget
methods.comment: Will go through the linked list and set the target node that is closest to the vehicles position as current target

methods.name: ClearRecording
methods.comment: Clears the linked list and destroyes the targets

properties.name: mMaxLength
properties.comment: Max length that the linked list can be
